name: Noukin Sugoroku
description:
Ever wanted go crazy with dice roll?

We have it for you!

"Noukin Sugoroku" is a digitized version of Japanese traditional boardgame "Sugoroku" but gone full-out on buffing up dice!!

You gain more dice, and powerful dice as you go around the map. Eventually, you get to through over 100 dices each turn and take extreme steps!

100 is not enough? why not go for 200 or even 300 dices!

*This game only contains local multiplayer.
